/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. A large white building with a curved roof stands out prominently in the background, its modern design contrasting with the traditional structures around it. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the foreground, a green bus adds a touch of color to the scene, indicating the city's active public transportation system. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the details and colors of the cityscape.
